text: 16|106|visvasiccatin sesam allahuvil avisvasiccavararea avarute -tannalute hrdayam visvasattil samadhanam puntatayirikke nirbandhikkappettavaralla; pratyuta, turanna manas'seate avisvasam svikariccavararea avarute- mel allahuvinkal ninnulla keapamuntayirikkum. avarkk bhayankaramaya siksayumuntayirikkum
